Package environment.world.pheromone

Class PheromoneWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • environment.World<Pheromone>
      • environment.world.pheromone.PheromoneWorld
  • public class PheromoneWorld
extends World<Pheromone>
    A class for a PheromoneWorld, being a layer of the total world, that contains Pheromones.

      • effectuate

        protected void effectuate​(Influence inf)
        Brings a given influence in effect in this world. This method knows the effects of certain influences and realizes them in this world.
        Specified by:
        effectuate in class World<Pheromone>
        Parameters:
        inf - the influence to bring in effect

      • putPheromone

        protected void putPheromone​(int x,
                            int y,
                            int lifetime)
        Puts a new Pheromone on the given coordinates in this PheromoneWorld with a specified initial lifetime. If there already is a Pheromone on the specified coordinate, reinforces this Pheromone with the specified lifetime amount. Updates the gui to show the pheromone.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the Pheromone that we want to put down
        y - y-coordinate of the Pheromone that we want to put down
        lifetime - the initial lifetime for the Pheromone

      • putDirPheromone

        protected void putDirPheromone​(int x,
                               int y,
                               int lifetime,
                               CellPerception target)
        Puts a new DirPheromone on the given coordinates in this PheromoneWorld with a specified initial lifetime and target. If there already is a DirPheromone on the specified coordinate, reinforces this DirPheromone with the specified lifetime amount. Updates the gui to show the pheromone.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the DirPheromone that we want to put down
        y - y-coordinate of the DirPheromone that we want to put down
        lifetime - the initial lifetime for the DirPheromone
        target - the target for the Dirpheromone

      • removePheromone

        protected void removePheromone​(int x,
                               int y)
        Removes a pheromone from a given coordinate.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the pheromone to be removed
        y - the y-coordinate of the pheromone to be removed

      • put

        public void put​(int x,
                int y)
        Puts a new pheromone on a specified coordinate (x, y). If at some time a pheromone on that position already exists, that pheromone is strengthened.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate for the new pheromone
        y - the x-coordinate for the new pheromone

      • putDirected

        public void putDirected​(int x,
                        int y,
                        CellPerception target)
        Puts a directed pheromone in this world with the default lifetime
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate for the pheromone to put
        y - the y-coordinate for the pheromone to put
        target - the target for the pheromone to put

      • put

        public void put​(int x,
                int y,
                int lifetime)
        Puts a new pheromone on a specified coordinate (x, y) with a given lifetime. If at some time a pheromone on that position already exists, thad pheromone is strengthened with lifetime.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate for the pheromone to put
        y - the y-coordinate for the pheromone to put
        lifetime - the lifetime for the pheromone to put

      • putDirected

        public void putDirected​(int x,
                        int y,
                        int lifetime,
                        CellPerception target)
        Puts a new directed pheromone on a specified coordinate (x, y) with a given lifetime and target. If at some time a pheromone on that position already exists, thad pheromone is strengthened with lifetime.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate for the DirPheromone to put
        y - the y-coordinate for the DirPheromone to put
        lifetime - the lifetime for the DirPheromone to put
        target - the target for the DirPheromone to put

      • putAndPropagate

        public void putAndPropagate​(int x,
                            int y)
        Puts a new pheromone on a specified coordinate and on all surrounding areas. If at some time a Pheromone on that position already exists, that Pheromone is strengthened.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the pheromone to put
        y - the y-coordinate of the pheromone to put

      • putAndPropagate

        public void putAndPropagate​(int x,
                            int y,
                            int lifetime)
        Puts a new pheromone on a specified coordinate with given lifetime and on all surrounding areas with a diminished factor of lifetime. If at some time a Pheromone on that position already exists, that Pheromone is strengthened.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the pheromone to put
        y - the y-coordinate of the pheromone to put
        lifetime - the lifetime for the pheromone to put

        Parameters:
